official_title: To authorize the Architect of the Capitol to establish a Capitol Visitor Center under the East Plaza of the United States Capitol, and for other purposes.
short_title: Jacob Joseph Chestnut-John Michael Gibson United States Capitol Visitor Center Act of 1999

summary.text: Jacob Joseph Chestnut-John Michael Gibson United States Capitol Visitor Center Act of 1999 - Authorizes the Architect of the Capitol to: (1) plan, construct, equip, administer, and maintain under the East Plaza of the U.S. Capitol the Jacob Joseph Chestnut-John Michael Gibson United States Capitol Visitor Center; and (2) reconstruct the East Plaza and environs to enhance its attractiveness, safety, and security.

titles.title: Jacob Joseph Chestnut-John Michael Gibson United States Capitol Visitor Center Act of 1999
To authorize the Architect of the Capitol to establish a Capitol Visitor Center under the East Plaza of the United States Capitol, and for other purposes.
